description: Works to trees within TPO 64 - grass area side of 7 Stags Way (TG1) - Lime x 1, Cotoneaster x 2, Silver Birch x 1 - lift to approx. 3m, grass area side of 49 Stags Way (T2) - Silver Birch - lift to provide clearance over garage, (T3) lime - lift to approx. 3m, side of 6 Crowntree Close (T4) - Oak - remove significant dead wood & cut back to provide clearance to street light, front of 8 Wyke Close (TG5) - Sorbus x 2 - lift to approx. 3m, block 69-74 Braybourne Drive (T6) - silver birch - cut back to provide clearance to lamp column,  block 82-89 Braybourne Drive (TG7) - Rowan Ash x3 - remove significant dead wood, side of garages (TG8) - Cherry x 3 - reduce to provide clearance to garages & lamp column,  front of 42-47 (T9) - Cotoneaster - lift to approx. 3m & reduce back to provide clearance to lamp column, Braybourne Drive entrance (T10) - Ash - reduce back to provide clearance to garage, opp 40 (TG11) - Sorbus x 2 - lift to approx. 3m, OS 2-7 (T12) - silver birch - reduce back lower limbs growing towards lamp column to prevent encroachment, OS 54 (T13) - Oak - cut back to provide clearance to lamp column, by lamp column 11 (T14) - Pear - cut back to provide clearance to lamp column, adj 1 Wyke Close (T15) - Blue Atlas Cedar - shorten longer branch ends over property by 1-1.5m (3 in report), right hand side of car park entrance (T16) - False Acacia - reduce back to upper reduction points (161 in report), between 53 Stags Way & 1 Crowther Close (T17) - Cedar of Lebanon - replacement of cable bracing as per report, (TG18) - sycamore x 3 - reduce by approx. 2-3m & prune to shape, (T19) - Rowan Ash - reduce by approx. 2-3m & prune to shape
